column1: Despite what @fordnation says.My intubated 30-50 year old #COVID patients were not congregating by choice.They were working in essential jobs where they have the highest exposure risk and the least protection.Do not insult their sacrifice.

We used this portable heart-lung machine as salvage therapy in a younger patients whose lungs had been damaged by #COVID. Until @ongov provides essential workers with #PaidSickDays, workplace protection & access to vaccinations, this machine will continue to be used. https://t.co/JuAgPhFm8N
